Uses of Interface
org.springframework.context.event.EventListenerFactory

  • Packages that use EventListenerFactory 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.context.event
    Support classes for application events, like standard context events.
    org.springframework.transaction.event
    Spring's support for listening to transaction events.

    • Uses of EventListenerFactory in org.springframework.context.event

      Classes in org.springframework.context.event that implement EventListenerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultEventListenerFactory
      Default EventListenerFactory implementation that supports the regular EventListener annotation.

    • Uses of EventListenerFactory in org.springframework.transaction.event

      Classes in org.springframework.transaction.event that implement EventListenerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TransactionalEventListenerFactory
      EventListenerFactory implementation that handles TransactionalEventListener annotated methods.
